titleStmt.title: A scheme of the whole book of the Revelation of Jesus Christ of very great use : with the following summarie of Daniels visions &c., for the right understanding of the parallel of that book and the Revelation after set down.
titleStmt.author: Sherwin, William, 1607-1687?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sherwin by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages cropped with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
